meanings.definition: Those who make an assertion without proof.
meanings.sent1: The allegers accused him of stealing without any evidence.
meanings.sent2: The allegers spread rumors without any basis.
meanings.sent3: The allegers joked that the moon was made of cheese, but no one believed them.
meanings.sent4: The allegers' words were like whispers in the wind, fleeting and unproven.
meanings.sent5: The allegers' claims floated around the room, unverified and uncertain.
